posts.content:
Is it just me or is this now the norm.......you put am add in the wanted section, you get a reply saying, yes I have what your after with a price, they say, can you send me a picture as they want to see what there buying, you send a picture, you hear no more from them even if you send the picture again and mail them.
The item in question was a clutch pedal, we all know what it looks like I guess, so having sent him the said picture, you'd think he would at least have the decency to reply with a yes or no, and if a no, then did he really need a pedal in the first place as looking at the post, no one else offered him one.
So, if your reading this then you know it's aimed at you, time waster........

What I advertise is what I sell, if it's genuine I say so, if it's repro I bin it.

Rocket Ron
Sorry that was me and my email server was full, nice of them to let me know. Again really sorry have emailed you.

author.location: Mayrhofen, Austria (but my for sale bits are in the UK)
